messages.speech:
Loose, watery and possibly more-frequent bowel movements. It can indicate a serious disorder, such as a persistent infection, inflammatory bowel disease, or a less serious condition, such as irritable bowel syndrome. Signs and symptoms associated with diarrhoea may include: Loose, watery stools, Abdominal
cramps,  Blood in the stool, Bloating, Nausea, Urgent need to have a bowel movement. Do you want to know about its preventive measures?
